Solutions

Drag and drop

Targetted to anyone looking to store data to the Decentralized web,
without any knowledge about Filecoin or decentralized web
Drag and drop files
Natively from your favorite environment (Windows/Mac/Linux) or using an iOS or Android app like WebDAV Navigator or readlle

Natively compatible with many tools

To send the files, you can use tools such as Rclone, Nextcloud, Winscp, Cryptomator, Duplicati, Zotero, Cyberduck and thousands more
